breakfast.title: Protein Scrambled Eggs with Greek Yogurt
breakfast.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs paired with Greek yogurt and berries for a protein-packed start.
instructions: Whisk 3 eggs with 2 tbsp milk in a bowl
Cook eggs in buttered pan over medium-low heat, stirring constantly
Serve with 1 cup Greek yogurt topped with mixed berries
Season eggs with salt and pepper to taste

lunch.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast with romaine lettuce and parmesan in a whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Season 6oz chicken breast and cook in skillet for 6-7 minutes per side
Let chicken rest 3 minutes, then slice
Mix romaine lettuce with 2 tbsp Caesar dressing and 2 tbsp parmesan
Wrap chicken and salad in large whole wheat tortilla
Cut in half and serve

dinner.title: Baked Salmon with Quinoa
dinner.description: Herb-crusted salmon fillet served over fluffy quinoa with steamed broccoli.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F and start cooking 1 cup quinoa according to package directions
Season 6oz salmon fillet with herbs, salt, and pepper
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky
Steam broccoli in microwave for 3-4 minutes
Serve salmon over quinoa with broccoli on the side

breakfast.title: Protein Pancakes with Turkey Sausage
breakfast.description: Fluffy protein pancakes made with protein powder served with lean turkey sausage links.
instructions: Mix 1 scoop protein powder, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup oats, and 2 tbsp milk in blender
Cook 3 turkey sausage links in skillet for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally
Pour pancake batter into heated non-stick pan, cook 2-3 minutes per side
Serve pancakes with sausage and sugar-free syrup

lunch.title: Tuna Salad Stuffed Avocado
lunch.description: High-protein tuna salad served in halved avocados with whole grain crackers.
instructions: Mix 2 cans tuna, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1 tbsp mayo, diced celery, salt and pepper
Cut 2 avocados in half and remove pits
Scoop tuna mixture into avocado halves
Serve with 10 whole grain crackers on the side

dinner.title: Beef Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
dinner.description: Lean beef strips stir-fried with mixed vegetables over brown rice.
instructions: Start cooking 1 cup brown rice according to package directions
Cut 6oz lean beef into strips and season with salt and pepper
Heat oil in wok, stir-fry beef for 3-4 minutes until browned
Add mixed frozen vegetables and stir-fry 4-5 minutes more
Serve over rice with soy sauce and sesame oil

breakfast.title: Cottage Cheese Bowl with Nuts
breakfast.description: Creamy cottage cheese topped with almonds, walnuts, and a drizzle of honey.
instructions: Place 1.5 cups cottage cheese in a bowl
Top with 2 tbsp mixed nuts (almonds and walnuts)
Drizzle with 1 tsp honey
Add a pinch of cinnamon for extra flavor

lunch.title: Black Bean and Chicken Bowl
lunch.description: Seasoned chicken breast over black beans and rice with fresh salsa.
instructions: Cook 6oz chicken breast seasoned with cumin and chili powder for 6-7 minutes per side
Heat 1 cup canned black beans with garlic and onion powder
Prepare 1/2 cup instant brown rice
Slice chicken and serve over beans and rice
Top with fresh salsa and 2 tbsp shredded cheese

dinner.title: Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
dinner.description: Lean turkey meatballs in marinara sauce served over spiralized zucchini noodles.
instructions: Mix 1lb ground turkey with 1 egg, breadcrumbs, and Italian seasoning
Form into 16 meatballs and bake at 425°F for 15 minutes
Spiralize 2 large zucchini into noodles
Sauté zucchini noodles for 2-3 minutes until tender
Serve meatballs over noodles with marinara sauce

breakfast.title: Protein Smoothie with Peanut Butter
breakfast.description: Creamy protein smoothie with banana, peanut butter, and protein powder.
instructions: Add 1 scoop protein powder, 1 banana, 2 tbsp peanut butter to blender
Pour in 1 cup milk and 1/2 cup ice
Blend on high for 60 seconds until smooth
Pour into glass and enjoy immediately

lunch.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, chickpeas, and feta cheese.
instructions: Season and grill 6oz chicken breast for 6-7 minutes per side
Mix 4 cups mixed greens with 1/2 cup chickpeas
Add 2 oz feta cheese and cherry tomatoes
Slice chicken and place on top of salad
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar

dinner.title: Baked Cod with Sweet Potato
dinner.description: Flaky baked cod fillet with roasted sweet potato wedges and green beans.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and cut 1 large sweet potato into wedges
Toss sweet potato with oil, salt, and pepper, bake for 20 minutes
Season 8oz cod fillet and bake for 12-15 minutes
Steam 1 cup green beans in microwave for 4 minutes
Serve cod with sweet potato wedges and green beans

breakfast.title: Ham and Cheese Omelet
breakfast.description: Fluffy three-egg omelet filled with diced ham and cheddar cheese.
instructions: Whisk 3 eggs with 2 tbsp milk in a bowl
Heat butter in non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour eggs into pan and let set for 2 minutes
Add 3oz diced ham and 1/4 cup cheese to one half
Fold omelet in half and slide onto plate

lunch.title: Lentil and Turkey Soup
lunch.description: Hearty soup with ground turkey, lentils, and vegetables in savory broth.
instructions: Brown 4oz ground turkey in pot with diced onions
Add 1 cup red lentils, 3 cups chicken broth, and diced carrots
Season with thyme, bay leaf, salt, and pepper
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until lentils are tender
Remove bay leaf and serve hot

dinner.title: Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Vegetables
dinner.description: Lean pork tenderloin with roasted Brussels sprouts and carrots.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces
Toss Brussels sprouts and carrots with oil, salt, and pepper
Roast vegetables for 20 minutes
Season 6oz pork tenderloin and sear in oven-safe pan for 2 minutes per side
Transfer pan to oven for 8-10 minutes until internal temp reaches 145°F
